TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GraphicsContextMissingException extends OpenTK.Graphics.GraphicsContextException

Docs.summary: Thrown when an operation that required GraphicsContext is performed, when no GraphicsContext is current in the calling thread.
